entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 11:30 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
